resources.string: First You Should Download Emulators from [Download Manager 4.0] Then Activate Them Here.

All ttf Fonts Should Be In /usr/share/fonts/
If You See Crash , Don't Panic
Use Persian Grandeur Android App
From Backup/Restore Choose Restore Skin.XML Backup
Or Wait For Auto Repair (2 Minutes)
Enter BISS key for current channel:
Enter HEX Audio PID For Current Channel:
Enter Decimal Audio PID For Current Channel:
Enter HEX Video PID For Current Channel:
Enter Decimal Video PID For Current Channel:
